website_summaries.verdict: Top-notch engineering, precision cutting, and rugged construction. Mower's modern tech is backed by a longstanding, respected company.
pros: Mow without a cord or gas
Includes battery kit and exceptional 5-year warranty
cons: It's expensive, but you'll save money on gas
It's also heavy and a bit difficult to push on hilly, uneven yards

customer_reviews.title: Technically Sound but No Apparent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have not had issues with the operation of the machine, but they failed to include a component (mulching insert) in the box, and I can't get anyone to call me back at their (supposed) Customer Service Department. As far as I can tell, they don't have their own quality control people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great till it died
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 2 months and I loved it, then just stopped and died completely. Called ego support who told me I had to bring it to the nearest specialized repair shop which is an hour away. Refused to pay for repair even if I did so, and repairing these things is really expensive so it's more or less totalled.
customer_reviews.author: TheLightningKing

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged and appeared to be used
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I've raised my review from 1 star to 5 stars, which is a pretty dramatic change. I was initially upset that the product had some cosmetic damage but my wife and I love the products and don't care about the scratches. It's only fair to give the product an excellent review. Wouldn't go back to gas powered for anything.
customer_reviews.author: One Man's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor & only 10 min run time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mower I've ever owned. Not more that 10 minutes run time per charge. I bought this because I only have a small patch of grass ( 25"x50"). I had ti charge the stupid battery 3 times! It is ridiculously weak. Healthy grass will bog the motor, even if it's only cutting 1 to 2 inches of length off. This is a VERY expensive cheesy knockoff of a battery mower. This purchase has made me sick to my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: After 2 hard seasons
customer_reviews.text: I have waited for 2 years to write this review. I mow an 80' x 140, yard every approx 3 days. I manicure my grass. If this mower were to break or was stole I would not think twice about purchasing another in a heart beat. One charge takes care of mowing, usually 3 charges in late fall when I am mulching leaves. Charging normally takes about 30-35 minutes for a fully drained battery. It's nice to just pull the mower out in the spring, slide the freshly charged battery in and mow. No gas, oil, carburetor cleaning, spark plugs or tune ups. I love it and have had no problems in the first 2 full seasons.
customer_reviews.author: B Holly

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: 1/8 th acre lot. Can mow front back and sides with one charge and still have enough battery to do the trimming. Only thing I would do differently would be to get the self propelled but at she 72 can still push this easily even after back surgery 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Morris Pence

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Be Beat
customer_reviews.text: Got it at noon, pops out of the box ready to go. Plugged in, ready in a half hour. The wife says it's 100% easier than the rotary we've been using for decades, so as far as I'm concerned, it's perfect. If things change I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Christian E. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and support
customer_reviews.text: Purchase in 2016 and just did the first 2019 mowing. What a great product, light weight and quiet. I'm reviewing now in part to laud the warranty coverage. I had a problem with what I believed to be the battery charger. The company representative was available and very responsive. She was concerned that the problem might be the charger or the battery. To make sure she sent both. Perfect! The new charger works properly and I now have two batteries. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CS in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a gas mower
customer_reviews.text: Already had the battery so just bought the mower. Wish I'd switched from gas to electric years ago. It's lighter, smoother, quieter, less vibration, no fumes -- almost like vacuuming the lawn. Battery lasts just about 30 min but also recharges in that amount of time, so I mow half, take a break while battery recharges, then finish up. Same battery works on EGO weed trimmer that we also have and like.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. ZW

customer_reviews.title: Poor batter life
customer_reviews.text: My battery stopped taking a charge within 3 mos of purchase. A new replacement batttery runs >$200. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt v

customer_reviews.title: The Rolls Royce of lawn mowers...
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower is so easy to use right out of the box! I have an EGO chainsaw and weed eater which are equal in quality to the lawn mower. The batteries are interchangeable so it makes it so easy to take care of my property. No more pulling a cord to start the mower. The push button key is so nice, especially when I have to start and stop to move debris out of the way. Obviously it is a luxury not to deal with gas fumes and oil. It feels so cool to have a garage full of EGO products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: All around awesome! Easy start, not too noisy(I can use ear buds while mowing), no dealing with gas, oil, spark plug etc. Purchased the snow blower last fall so already had 2 batteries. Bought the mower and weed wacker(no battery) and use the batteries I already had. Actually, I can mow and weed wack entire yard with one battery charge. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CapeWaterSports

customer_reviews.title: a better quality, sharper blade (out of the box)
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a DR Neuton 36 volt 19 inch lawnmower. This has more power, a better quality, sharper blade (out of the box). Cuts great through thick Florida St Augustine grass. Battery life is long- more than an hour. Best feature is 5 different cutting deck heights. It gives a lot of control in enabling to cut just the right amount of grass off the top. Very lightweight. It compares very favorably to a gas mower. I also have the backpack blower and can cut an average sized lot and blow all on one battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss my gas mower for one second!
customer_reviews.text: EGO is the way to go! Light weight. Easy to push and maneuver. I have a medium size yard. The smallest EGO battery provides enough charge to finish mowing. One complaint however; when lowered to lowest cutting position the front sometimes digs in to the ground. I don't use the lowest setting for that reason. I will buy EGO yard equipment from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Waited a over a year before providing this review: This product is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Rodoba- Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'll buy a second blade because I'm always hitting rocks, but the performance is great. If you have a large lot you'll need the highest capacity, or, just mow it in two passes. The battery charges quickly. Take a lunch break, have a beer, and the battery may be ready for another round. Nothing bad to say about it..... but this is late fall and not much more mowing to do. Actually bags up leaves nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: james boles

customer_reviews.title: Just AWESOME.....
customer_reviews.text: As a former landscaper I never thought I would say this about an electric, but this is hands down the best mower I've ever used. I will never go back to gasoline again. Buy this mower. You will NOT regret it!
customer_reviews.author: ChuckG

customer_reviews.title: Sits in the garage
customer_reviews.text: If they would have told me there was no battery I would have gone another way. Now I have to wait more days and pay $0ver 500 more for a battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and uses same battery as my trimmer. Easy adjustment handle adjust whole mower height. Have to go a bit slower through thick patches of grass but it performs well. Quiet compared to gas, sounds like a large circular fan running on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I was ready for a bad review!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was all prepared to leave a bad review. As the nagger wouldn't work on the mower. Well that is 100% my fault. I didn't read the directions and did not realize there was a plug that had to be removed in order to bag the clippings. Once removed bags like a champ. Mower is light weight and easy to push cut through thick St. Augistine with ease. After mowing my 3500 sqft lot I dethatched then went over the thatch to catch the clipping 3 other times before the battery finally had enough and needed a recharge. So far very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: This mower is great! Easy to store, lift, transport. Battery life is really good, half an hour of mowing doesn't even drain half. It chomped through overgrown grass of 6-8". Have a snowblower, too. Really pleased with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lawn Mower!
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower is a gem. I received the 21" in lieu of the 20" that was in the description so thumbs up on that. It's light weight so its not hard to push. I didn't get the self propelled version because I prefer pushing it to get a little exercise since I work a desk job. There is no emissions since it's battery operated. Extremely easy to store. Battery usually lasts about 45 minutes. I have had no problems with the lawn mower. The only thing I regret is not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more impressed with this lawn mower. As soon as I received it, I charged the battery and put it to work. The lawn had gone longer than usual between mowings due to heavy rains, and I was concerned that it would be a bit much for the EGO to handle. I was wrong...it handled every bit of the overgrown, wet lawn without skipping a beat. My only regret is that I did not purchase sooner. Take the leap you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Loud and Clear Audio and Tint

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to mow
customer_reviews.text: It's like the Tessa of lawn mowers. Very light weight . Used to be a chore to mow lawn now it's a breeze. Wish it would snow in Arizona so I could buy the snow blower. I have all tools. Battery lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: I love it! easy to use, no gasoline and I’ve taught my young son on it; the lower decibel sound is good for kids to learn on!
customer_reviews.author: eric j vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasted 3 years
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this item, but the battery began malfunctioning after the 3 year warranty expired. Batteries are expensive. Kind of like buying a new engine for a regular mower after 3 years. Not so good EGO
customer_reviews.author: C. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: While I was initially skeptical of a battery powered lawn mower, the first use put any doubts out of my mind. This is one powerful mower. Was able to mow my entire lawn (~5000 sq ft) on one charge. ~40 minute run time with ~25 minute charge time. Highly recommended. Would absolutely consider purchasing other EGO battery powered items.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Just putting it away for the winter after 2 full years of use. I can comfortably say now that IT IS JUST AS POWERFUL AS ANY GAS MOWER I'VE OWNED. It last between 35-45 minutes on a charge. If that's not enough time to finished, put the battery on the charger, have a beer, then go finish. You'll never again need to worry about running out for gas, changing spark plugs, or oil. Best. purchase. ever!
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Tarriff

customer_reviews.title: Have used it about 6 times and very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Have used it about 6 times and very happy with it. Much lighter and quieter than the old gas hog. Only issue is the battery. I have two batteries and chargers since I have other EGO equipment and I need to use both to do the yard which takes about 40-50 minutes. I go through one battery and about 1/2 of the other. No big deal though since I have two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Z.

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Cuts good but it only ran for 20 minutes from a full charge before needing to be recharged again. Maybe a defective battery???? Contacted seller and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, lightweight and battery lasts a decent amount of time. Just wish the battiries were not so expensive i really want to get the whole line of EGO products but they are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Compact portable and efficient electric mower.  Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small lawn. It is compact, foldable, and light enough for me to carry up steps from my back yard to front. Cuts the grass clean. Never had any power issues or battery running out.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B Nimble

customer_reviews.title: A Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: Okay - took it out of the box easily - mounted the charger on my garage wall - charged the battery and off I went. It's light, easy to use, quiet, powerful and I get two mowings of a quarter acre lot on one charge. I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: RSP

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT able to cut a 2 inch patchy lawn. Poor power output.
customer_reviews.text: Was NOT able to cut a 2 inch patchy lawn. Full charged battery still kept stalling every few minutes with the red light indicator showing up. Waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Jaisinghani

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for smaller yards.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mower. Not enough battery for my almost quarter acre yard. Does fantastic on my daughter’s smaller yard. Gave her this one and I bought the self-propelled one. Recommend the brand.
customer_reviews.author: LS4

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Had a Newton mower for years and it did OK but the EGO has far superior in performance, not really discernable from using a gas powered mower. Longer battery life, quicker recharge, and more durably built than the Newton too.
customer_reviews.author: H. Grognard

customer_reviews.title: Change batteries and keep going.
customer_reviews.text: I have mowed three times now with this mower, and like it. It isn't as powerful as a gas mower, nor even as powerful as a corded electric I have owned, but works well, and owning two batteries, I can have one in use and one on the charger ready to go. It takes longer to mow with this mower as I can't mow as quickly, but it is quiet and easy to start, use and put away. I have trouble with build up of wet grass under it, but I noticed someone posted a work around for that. I am not sure the blade is as high quality metal as other mowers I've owned, but so far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Collect them all!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband without battery as we bought the snowblower earlier in the year. He loves how quiet it is and can mow the whole lawn both front and back on a single charge. I love how compact is can fold up it saves a lot of space in the garage. We have most of the other tools from this company all battery powered.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Really like its quiet operation and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Used the mower only two times for a fairly small yard. Really like its quiet operation and light weight. Cuts grass very evenly and cleanly! My only reservation is that the battery life seems short -- already needs a charge after only two cuttings (each mow takes about 15 to 20 minutes).
customer_reviews.author: Doug V.

customer_reviews.title: EGO has done it again.
customer_reviews.text: One great 57 volt lawn mower. Easy to handle and it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Tripamer

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS SAYS IT ALL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE MOWER- NO FUEL, NO OIL CHANGE, JEST PUSH THE BUTTON & CUT. THE BATTERY DID BECOME DEFECTIVE THE SECOND YEAR. CALLED EGO POWER AND THEY SHIPPED A REPLACEMENT TO MY HOME- FREE OF CHARGE. SERVICE AFTER THE SALE SURE IS NICE.
customer_reviews.author: wlphelps222

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, second key missing half of it. 5 star if it’s replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Got this last October, past mowing time. Just opened it today. Easy to assemble, a dram to operate. It came with two keys, one which is missing the part that inserts into the mower. Love to have that replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to use. Don’t miss the hassle of gas and oil. I already have the EGOsnowblower with two large capacity batteries so no problem mowing my larger lawn. I ordered this without batteries. Good job at mulching.
customer_reviews.author: PeteF

customer_reviews.title: This mower is fantastic, no more oil changes
customer_reviews.text: This mower is fantastic, no more oil changes, no more filter changes, no more spark plugs or gummed up carburetors, just drop the battery in and go.
customer_reviews.author: S. bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had ordered the right mower.
customer_reviews.text: It really is a good mower. I apparently ordered the wrong one as I wanted a self propelled. This one is not. I had no luck in returning it.
customer_reviews.author: doug w lant

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC product. Plenty of power to mow my lawn
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC product. Plenty of power to mow my lawn, and I pull the battery and then use my EGO trimmer to clean up the edging. Happy not to deal with fouled plugs and gas anymore.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic lawn mower!! Two of my neighbors are already inquiring about it. LOVE it!! The ease of use is above average and then you can store it like a suit case.
customer_reviews.author: Jim DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull electric lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: I've been wary of electric lawn mowers, but this one is very powerfull! I like it's trim design and it's functionality. I don't have a large lawn, about 300 square feet. But so far I've had to charge up the power pack once and mowed the lawn 3 times on that charge.
customer_reviews.author: Noli5

customer_reviews.title: ... sessions under my belt with this mower and very happy with it--lots of power and light and maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: Have a few sessions under my belt with this mower and very happy with it--lots of power and light and maneuverable. Don't miss my old gas mower for one second.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Sultan

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this two months ago so far very good
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Its also so easy to push across the lawn
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my dad and he loves it. He loves how light it is and its folding ability. Its also so easy to push across the lawn. We have had it for almost 2 weeks without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD MICHINE and Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. I wish I get one that self propellant instead of drive behind for elderly person. It is a good exercise and fun to mow the lawn with a EGO machine.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mower, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Mower, easy to use ,the battery lasts for 45 min,very easy to store. I researched all the battery powered mowers out there, this was the highest rated and it has lived up to that rating' Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckokie

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing mower I love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: I was able to mow my yard and the easement of my neighbors yards which I did just for fun and I only used the 2.5 a battery which is only half of the recommended battery for this machine and I still have enough power left to blow my sidewalks. Amazing truly amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best lawn mower I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best lawn mower I have ever owned! Its lightweight but strong enough to mow down tall wet grass. And the battery lasted a good hour! It is fantastic! I am very impressed
customer_reviews.author: rennie

customer_reviews.title: A joy to use - light weight but lots of power
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but I love this mower. I have a 3/4 of an acre to mow and it can't do it all in one go, but it does half an acre on one charge. The battery charges quickly, about an hour - so it not a worry. I definitely recommend this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Saetta

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but nice
customer_reviews.text: I wish the battery was just a bit longer. Very quiet, easy to push even up a slight hill. Will update review for year two.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyStuff

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this mower. It is my favorite mower ever. Just unfold it, insert battery and key (in about 30 seconds), mow then insert battery into charger, fold mower back up and put it all away until next time....
customer_reviews.author: susan b.

customer_reviews.title: but great things and i have the trimmer and chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: haven't started it yet, but great things and i have the trimmer and chainsaw. the chainsaw surprised me, i got a lot done. the mower pays for it self in one summer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W Drake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for townhouse lawn maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I have a townhouse backyard that I am responsible for. It is a large yard for a townhouse, but still not a large yard by most standards. This mower has far more power and battery life than I need for the job. So far, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: James Nelson Ensley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing machine, a joy to use and one can even carry on a conversation while mowing the yard. Following the easy directions, I charged the battery, installed it quickly went to work. Would I buy this again or recommend it to others? Without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Green,the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful mower,very easy to use. So much better than typical gas mower!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Cuts really good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Cuts really good. After an hour of work, we stop to get the battery charged. Battery charges about 30 minutes. If you want to do continuous work, invest in another battery to interchange them as your charge the other.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to use, cuts surprisingly well, has great power. The battery lasts longer than I expected, might get 30-40 minutes depending on grass depth.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in St Louis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mower
customer_reviews.text: I'm no greenie and have also had gas yard equipment. I LOVE this mower. Mulching and ease of use far exceeds my expectations. I plan to expand with blower and trimmer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Charges in 45 minutes and runs for 1 1/2 hours. I'm a 58 year old woman and this mower has worked wonderfully! I've mowed a huge yard 3 times now. It takes 3 hours to mow the yard, not counting the 45 minute break I take (and need) while the battery is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Bladewalker

customer_reviews.title: Power yet quiet; battery died 3.1y after bought
customer_reviews.text: Much power. It is quiet enough to allow me to listen to lectures/music while mowing and NOT turning the sound level to damaging levels; battery died right after the 3y warranty ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Nosey Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Has done an excellent job mowing my lawn
customer_reviews.text: Has done an excellent job mowing my lawn. Battery easily lasts more than an hour full mowing without any kind of slowdown.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vraspir

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mower.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, where was this mower 5 years ago. I really enjoy its quietness and the fact the batter lasts long enough to also run the edger and blower.
customer_reviews.author: John S Hansmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect No Aggravating Extra Steps
customer_reviews.text: So far the perfect easy to use mower. Fast, light weight, no extra steps or aggravation. Mow & store.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Gas to battery and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let this thing fool you. I've cut my grass wet and tall and it powered thru. It's easy to maneuver and folds down to take up no space in the garage. The battery lasted me two cuts and about 50 cuts with the 14 inch chain saw. I went out on a limb and bought both and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Clatworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: the description described a used unit but it was just like new out-of-the-box from Home Depot or something but half the price
customer_reviews.author: Tiddkidd

customer_reviews.title: so good. Have mowed twice with no
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Have mowed twice with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Bob Henry

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it has some shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: Short Version: I like this mower but it has some downfalls Long Version: Pros: Can be stored easily Quieter than gas mowers 3 cut options Easy adjustable heights for mowing Brilliant mulching Easily adjustable handlebar Cons: Handlebars can strain your hands after about 20 minutes of use Has a hard time cutting at level 2 or level 1. Mine won't even cut at level 2. Has a hard time cutting wet grass. 62 lbs total weight. My gas mower was 35 lbs. Battery doesn't seem to last 55 minutes. More like 40 minutes under heavy load. One time it shut off after 10 minutes of operation after a full charge. Maybe I got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: and easily mowed my new lawn that was a bit overgrown
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, quiet, and easily mowed my new lawn that was a bit overgrown. Love it and the hedge trimmer also.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, I have the self propelled version and 9 batteries so when I saw this was at a great price on Amazon I jumped on it, the quality is great, it's light weight and yes it chops thru Saint Augustine grass quite well, BUT, I'd only recommend it if you are lucky enough like me to have multiple hi amp batteries, otherwise it goes thru batteries at a quicker rate I just use my 5.0 amp chainsaw battery and it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products! So easy to use and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed with this lawn mower. My yard ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this lawn mower. My yard is small but have very thick St. Augustine grass. I keep the mower on the highest setting and it handles the duties well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very please with the quality of this mower. Really easy to use and quiet. The one-touch eight adjustment is very clever.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flink

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: The husband loves it - says it's the best mower he's ever used.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa.ann83

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and no gas/oil or air filter/carburetor to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Jon P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice lawnmower very smooth while pushing and cuts the lawn really nice
customer_reviews.author: Eric Inwood

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed because I thought I ordered a self-propelled EGO lawn ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed because I thought I ordered a self-propelled EGO lawn mower and it is definitely not! Other than that, it's a good mower.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY STATCZAR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good by gas lawn mower. Hello ego power just an awesome mower. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo vega

customer_reviews.title: Missing the safety key
customer_reviews.text: The lawn mower was as discribed except it is missing the safety key. Can’t find a way to contact the seller. Would really like to have the key...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The battery doesn't last as long as it suggests. We need to buy a 2nd one. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Boogdie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Clean
customer_reviews.text: works great, mows my 1/3 acre lawn in one charge and has plenty of power with no gas and oil mess
customer_reviews.author: liam ryan

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this lawn mower. My only disappointment is that it didn't come with the battery and charger and I had to buy each separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very good mower, if you have a smallish yard
customer_reviews.text: Very good mower, if you have a smallish yard. I can cut for about an hour and 1/2 on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than a gas unit
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Fast charging battery Con: compares to another electric one I had before, this unit is super heavy. It make cutting grass a hard work. Also, if I switch to set cut level to 3, the grass will stuck and the unit will stop work many times until I have to manually scoop the grass out. I end up have to cut grass almost twice a week. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it works on a small yard but not mine. I dread cutting the grass. It stops frequently, it clogs very easily and is heavy. The battery lasts about 20 minutes (mower purchased 2 mos. ago). I regret spending so much money on such a worthless machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No battery included.
customer_reviews.text: No battery?! As if it's not expensive enough, now I have to buy a $100 plus battery?!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Where was I all this products life?
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I was not aware of this product line long ago. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: styx

customer_reviews.title: we have a small flat yard and it is perfect. so light i just flipped it over and ...
customer_reviews.text: what a gem ! never died down once ! we have a small flat yard and it is perfect. so light i just flipped it over and cleaned under it after i was finished. i am a female and i wanted no part of mixing oil and gas all the time so this is the answer for me
customer_reviews.author: pongladi

customer_reviews.title: This mower is great as it requires no gas
customer_reviews.text: This mower is great as it requires no gas, etc. However, it is very difficult to push through the grass. We prefer the old self-propelled mower which was much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Want to now your grass in the morning before it gets too hot? DONT but this machine. The wet grass sticks to the inside of the machine, clogs up the side discharge and then wears down their battery all while making the machinenshake violently. In order to get it to work again, you have to scoop out the entire underside and dischae chute with your hand, now you have a pile of dead grass to clean up, one of many, because you'll do this numerous times. Out of a full charge I got about 20 minutes of cut time. Absolutely worthless. For less than 1\3 you can get a lawnmower that actually works. WASTE OF MONEY. DONT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We love this for our small lot! So quite and works great!
customer_reviews.author: K.Hildreth

product_meta.title: EGO Power+ LM2000-S 20-Inch 56-Volt Lithium-Ion Cordless Walk Behind Lawn Mower (Battery and Charger Not Included)
feature_bullets: True 3-In-1 Function: Superior mulching, rear bagging and side discharge performance
20" Cut Capacity: Cut more grass in less time
600W, High-Torque, Magnetic Motor: Designed for gas like power at 3300RPM
Folds quickly and easily for compact, upright storage
LED Headlights: Allow for mowing anytime
Convenient Push-Button Start: No more pull cord, easily starts at the press of a button
Compatible with all EGO power+ arc lithium batteries
